title: Scorecard: 42.6% ❌
content:
Project scorecard generated.

## Overall Score: 42.6%
Production Ready: ❌ No

## Component Scores
- documentation: 100%
- uniqueness: 97.5%
- parallelizable: 90.5%
- codebase: 80%
- clarity: 53.3%
- performance: 40.0%
- security: 36.4%
- alignment: 27.6%
- dogfooding: 10.0%
- testing: 0.0%
- completion: 0.0%
- ci_cd: 0.0%

## Blockers
- Security controls incomplete
- Test coverage too low

## Recommendations
- [critical] Security: Implement path boundary enforcement, rate limiting, and access control
- [high] CodeQL: Enable CodeQL workflow for automated security scanning
- [high] Testing: Fix failing tests and increase coverage to 30%
- [medium] Performance: Enable: mcp_connection_pooling, async_operations
- [medium] Tasks: Complete pending tasks to show progress
